title: Shakespeare and America
itunes:title: Shakespeare and America
itunes:subtitle: James Shapiro considers why England’s foremost playwright has had such a profound impact on the United States. Historyextra.con/podcast
description:
Acclaimed author James Shapiro considers why England’s foremost playwright has had such a profound impact on the United States, and how his words speak to contemporary concerns. Historyextra.con/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
